Summary: {cak} Large lights going around 8 of them in sky
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Texarkana
There were no other sightings in Texarkana on or around October 6th 2013
divs: sighting detailsthis all began three or so months ago,we noticed these large things in the sky with red,bluish green,amber lights going around just sitting out there sometimes 4 sometimes 8 we would watch them through binoculars,one night i flashed a flash light at them 3at a time then an orange reddish orb flew past me,then a couple of weeks later a white orb came past me,this is perplexing and we can not explain it,as i am writing this they are sitting out in the sky. [name removed\cms\tg]
